title: Number of professionals at the leading accounting firms in the U.S. 2019
summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Accounting firm, and Number of professionals in each Accounting firm on the y axis.
Accounting firm Deloitte has the highest Number of professionals and Mazars USA has the lowest Number of professionals.
There is a difference of 73254.0 between the maximum Accounting firm Deloitte and minimum Accounting firm Mazars USA.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Accounting firm in the x axis and Number of professionals in the y axis.
The maximum Number of professionals 73855.0 is found at Accounting firm Deloitte and the minimum is found at Mazars USA where Accounting firm is 601.0.
Second maximum Number of professionals is found at Accounting firm PwC.
There is a difference of 73254.0 between the maximum Accounting firm Deloitte and minimum Accounting firm Mazars USA.
The Accounting firm Deloitte has the highest Number of professionals, followed by PwC, and Ernst & Young. Down to the Accounting firm Mazars USA which is the lowest.
The Accounting firm Mazars USA has 8.46 times less Number of professionals than average.
